source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Prep to Pass the Professional in Human Resources (PHR)® Exam

visible_instructors.title: Kathy Nguyen, MPS, PHR, SHRM-CP
visible_instructors.name: Kathy
visible_instructors.job_title: Result-oriented and Passionate Human Resources Professional

items.headline: The Complete Preparation Course for the Professional in Human Resources (PHR)® Exam
objectives_summary: This course will provide a detailed overview and foundational knowledge for HR professionals who are preparing for the PHR certification exam.
Five HR functional areas: HR Strategic Management, Talent Planning and Acquisition, Total Rewards, Employee and Labor Relations, Learning and Development
Foundational Human Resources knowledge to become an effective HR generalist

items.headline: This course provides the tools you need to create an engaged work environment.
objectives_summary: Explore the definition of employee engagement
Identify the seven facets of employee engagement, as identified by decades of research including; building trust, providing challenging work, connecting work to the mission, and more...
Explore over 50 simple, easy to implement action items that can increase engagement immediately after the webinar

items.title: Non-Executive Directorship For Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Adrian Knight
visible_instructors.name: Adrian
visible_instructors.job_title: Small Business Extraordinaire

items.headline: Learn how to build a lucrative and rewarding portfolio career as a Non-Executive Director.
objectives_summary: An introduction to Non-Executive Directorships. Understand the world of Non-Executive Directorship including what a Non-Executive Director does,  does, what roles they play in an organisation, what's expected from a Non-Executive Director and what a Non-Executive Director can expect in return.

Get started with your personal branding and learn how to package yourself in the best way possible. Craft and refine your Board Summary, your Non-Executive CV, your LinkedIn profile and your elevator pitch - all specifically crafted to make you stand out above other Non-Executive Directors.
Learn the inside track on how companies really recruit Non-Executive Directors and fast track yourself through the interview process.

items.title: Organization Development (OD) in Practice

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course discusses how Organization Development helps the people within an organization develop.
objectives_summary: Explore the growth of the human economy and how organizational systems work from an Organization Development (OD) perspective.
Identify dialogic and diagnostic Organization Development (OD) and the OD practitioners’ role in faciliting appreciation, curiosity, and inquisitiveness.
Discover how Organization Development (OD) can be applied to support people playing an active role in driving forward positive organizational change.
